title: DIRECT X error
body:
Hey i have a problem

When i have selected my champ and the countdown has finished and the loading screen is about to come up. A box pops up saying, "An unknown DirectX error has occurred and League of Legends cannot start. Please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the manufacturer"

replies.body:
Hey

To start with, I'd suggest you check out the support page for [bug splats & game crashes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) and see if anything jumps out at you.

Let me know how you go!

Mindstar
